description.@en: My faith in the law has allowed me a keen insight into people, and I’m able to navigate past any lie or falsehood a client may tell me.

data.notes: Every Profession possesses a unique knack, an ability that no other Profession has access to. The Trait immediately follows the Profession’s description.

effect.@en: You can determine if someone is lying without making a Skill Test, providing you can clearly see and hear them. In addition, your lies are seen as being truthful by others, unless aided by Spells or by another Lawyer.
